display_long_description:
DanceFloorVR™ – Step into the Rhythm and Rule the Floor!
Move, groove, and combo your way through genre-themed arenas in this dynamic VR dance game! Whether you’re chasing high scores or vibing to the beat, DanceFloorVR™ turns every step into a show.

🎵 4 Music Genres – 12 Levels to Master
Choose your groove and unlock multi-level challenges in each genre:
✅ Electro Pop – Neon City Lights
✅ EDM / Cyber Rave – Underground Laser Club
✅ Hip-Hop – Graffiti Battle Rooftops
✅ Synthwave – Retro Pixel Arcade

⚡Each genre has 3 progression levels with increasing speed, complexity, and unique wall visuals.

🕺 New Combo & Badge System

✅Hit 3+ perfect moves to trigger glowing COMBO chains
 Unlock Achievement Badges like:
    🥇 Combo King
    🥈 Sync Master
    🥉 Rhythm Explorer
    🏆 Bonus: Beat Champion (Earn all 3)

❄️ Bonus Finale Level
Complete all genres to unlock a hidden Snow-Themed Stage with its own vibe and difficulty.
⏱ Over 40+ Minutes of Gameplay Designed

⚡ Rhythm-Based Challenges:
✅ Players must step on highlighted grids in time with the music.
✅ Each successful hit increases the score, while missed steps reduce the momentum.

⭐ Responsive Controls:
✅ VR controller and head tracking ensure intuitive, natural movement.
✅ Visual feedback (e.g., grid “press” animations and material changes) confirms successful actions.

🎶Dynamic Audio & Visuals:
✅ An electrifying soundtrack that drives gameplay.
✅ High-quality visual effects and lighting that respond to player actions.
